From https://www.wsj.com/market-data/quotes/AMZN/financials/annual/income-statement

```{r}
year <- c(2018, 2019, 2020, 2021, 2022)
revenue <- c(232887, 280522, 386064, 469822, 513983)
n_rows <- length(revenue)
revenue_data <- data.frame(year,revenue)

growth <- diff(revenue_data$revenue)
revenue_data$growth <- NA
revenue_data$growth[2:n_rows] <- growth

growth_rate <- growth / revenue_data$revenue[1:n_rows-1]
revenue_data$growth_rate <- NA
revenue_data$growth_rate[2:n_rows] <- growth_rate

plot_matrix <- cbind(revenue_data$revenue, revenue_data$growth)
row.names(plot_matrix) <- revenue_data$year

print(plot_matrix)
```
